EmailTemplate.subject: Updated Savings (1560355412.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hello Megan, Please follow these steps to view your preferred price list on your account, including letter size paper at $40.80 per carton Step 1: Login to account Step 2: Click Order tab Step 3: Click Custom List Step 4: View Custom List
